whatIsEmm.title: What is EMM?
whatIsEmm.description1: EMM (Enterprise Mobility Management) is a solution that comprehensively manages mobile devices, applications, and content within an enterprise. The main purpose is to efficiently manage employees' mobile device usage and securely protect enterprise data.
whatIsEmm.description2: EMM systematically manages enterprise mobile devices through provisioning. By automating the entire lifecycle from device registration to app installation and security policy application, it reduces IT administrators' workload and strengthens enterprise security.

whatIsProvisioning.title: What is Provisioning?
whatIsProvisioning.description: Provisioning is the process of automatically configuring and managing enterprise mobile devices. It greatly improves IT administrators' work efficiency by automating device registration, app installation, security policy application, and network settings.

whenToUseEmm.title: When EMM is Needed
situations: When mobile device management is needed in remote/hybrid work environments
When enterprise critical data needs to be securely protected in mobile environments
When efficient management of multiple employee mobile devices is required
When implementing BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) policies
When mobile security compliance is required

awesomeoneFeatures.title: AwesomeONE Features
awesomeoneFeatures.description: AwesomeONE is an innovative solution that achieves both IT administrator convenience and solution reliability.

questions.question: What is EMM?
questions.answer: EMM (Enterprise Mobility Management) is a solution that manages and secures mobile devices in enterprise environments. It provides various features including device management, app management, and content management.

questions.question: What is Provisioning?
questions.answer: Provisioning is the process of granting EMM management authority to mobile devices. This enables the application of corporate security policies and efficient device management.

questions.question: What is the pricing policy?
questions.answer: Pricing is based on device licenses, with both basic and premium plans available. Please contact our sales team for detailed pricing information.

questions.question: Can I try it for free?
questions.answer: If you would like to try it for free, please request a free trial through our Contact form.

questions.question: What languages are supported?
questions.answer: We currently support Korean and English, with plans to support additional languages in the future.
